bibl.title: State of Nebraska Department of Trade and Commerce Bureau of Insurance Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the year 1927

respStmt.name: OCLC Online Computer Library Center Inc.

p.seg: State of Nebraska DEPARTMENT OF Trade and Commerce Bureau of Insurance Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the year 1927 Also Comparative Figures of Authorized Companies for the years 1924, 1925 and 1926

To His Excellency: Hon. Adam McMullen, Governor. We herewith submit the summary of business of companies authorized to write insurance in this State for the year ending December 31, 1927, including the names of companies organized, admitted, reinsured, withdrawn, examined, etc., during the year, also deposit of securities of domestic companies. DEPARTMENT OP TRADE AND COMMERCE, JOHN R. DUMONT, Insurance Commissioner. CLARENCE G. BUSS, Secretary.

4 NEBRASKA INSURANCE REPORT COMPANIES ORGANIZED IN NEBRASKA IN 1927 American Indemnity Association, Lincoln, Nebraska. Writes accident and health. Conservative Casualty Insurance Company, Grand Island, Nebraska. Writes accident and health. Union Pacific Assurance Company of America, Omaha, Nebraska. Writes life.

INSURANCE REPORT COMPANIES OF OTHER STATES ADMITTED IN 1927 American Merchant Marine Ins. Co., New York City, N. Y. Writes fire and marine. Century Indemnity Company, Hartford, Conn. Writes health and accident, fidelity, surety and casualty. Constitution Indemnity Co., Philadelphia, Penn. Writes casualty and miscellaneous insurance. Druggists Mutual Ins. Co. of Iowa, Algona, Iowa. Writes fire, lightning, windstorm, cyclone and tornado. Globe life Ins. Co., Wilmington, Del. Writes legal reserve life. Great American Indemnity Co., New York City, N. T. t«f * i ; 11 . , , , , , , . . . Writes miscellaneous as permitted by sub-division 3 to 14 except sub-division 10, of Sec. 7814, Compiled Statutes of Nebraska includ - ing 1927 Session Laws. Harmonia Fire Ins. Co., Buffalo, N. Y. Writes fire and marine including rain. Highways Motor Underwriters, Kansas City, Mo. Writes auto insurance on reciprocal plan. Homeland Insurance Co. of America, New York City, N. Y. Writes fire and marine. Inter-Southern Life Ins. Co., Louisville, Ky. Writes life and accident. Michigan Fire and Marine Ins. Co., Detroit, Mich. Writes fire and marine. Monarch Life Ins. Co., Springfield, Mass. Writes life. New England Fire Ins. Co., Pittsfield, Mass. Writes fire, marine (except ocean marine) and sprinkler leakage. Sentinel Life Ins. Co., Kansas City, Mo. Writes life, health and accident. State Farm Mutual Automobile Ins. Co., Bloomington, 111. Writes automobile and other vehicle. Union Labor Life Ins. Co., Washington, D. C. Writes life, health and accident. United Mutual Fire Ins. Co., Boston, Mass. Writes fire and marine as specified in Sec. 7814 Subdivision 1 and 12, Compiled Statutes 1922. Western Fire Ins. Co., Fort Scott, Kans. Writes fire and marine.

COMPANIES THAT REINSURED, CHANGED NAME, WITHDREW, CHANGED PLAN OF DOING BUSINESS, ETC., IN 1927 Reinsured International Indemnity Co., Los Angeles, California, reinsured in Union Indemnity Co. and La Salle Fire Ins. Co., Dec. 1927. Michigan Mutual Life Ins. Co., Detroit, Mich., reinsured in National Life U. S. A., April 1927. Changed Name American Life Reinsurance Co., Dallas, Texas, changed to American Life Insurance Co., Dec. 30, 1927. Withdrew American Bankers Ins. Co., Jacksonville, 111., withdrew May 1, 1927. American Insurance Union, Columbus, Ohio, withdrew August 9, 1927. Dorchester Farmers Mutual Ins. Co., Dorchester, Nebr., liquidating in 1927. Ft Dearborn Casualty Underwriters, Chicago, 111., withdrew April 1, 1927. Inter-State Fire Ins. Co., Detroit, Mich., withdrew Aug. 31, 1927. Lincoln Casualty Co., Springfield, 111., in hands of receiver March 3, 1927. New Jersey Fire Ins. Co., Newark, N. J., withdrew May 1, 1927. North American Life Ins. Co., Chicago, 111., withdrew May 1, 1927. Republic Fire Ins. Co., Pittsburgh, Penn., withdrew May 1, 1S27. Sons & Daughters of Mercy, Omaha, Nebr., license denied in 1927. Stuyvesant Ins. Co., New York City, N. Y., withdrew February 24, 1927. Utah Home Fire Ins. Co., Salt Lake City, Utah, withdrew May 1, 1927. Changed Plan of Doing Business Dwelling House Mutual Ins. Co., Lincoln, Nebr., changed from an assess - ment to mutual company in 1927. Guardian life Ins. Co., New York City, N. Y., changed from stock to mutual in 1925.
